column4: thanks for the skype link. I've been followign those instructions, and I'm stuck on Audio Problems 1.3
I can't get the mic to work
Excellent, now have you got the microphone working outside skype?
no
Well if it won't work outside skype, it won't work inside skype either :)
Just for fun, right-click on the speaker icon in the men and choose Open Volume Control
ok
Do you see a window with lots of sliders?
Can you see a slider for microphone?
all the sliders are at max. nothing is checked in the mute boxes, including the slider for front mic and mic
Tick the mute for microphone, then untick it.
ok...
Are there any tabs on the window?
no...
no change when trying to record a test sound file (using krec)
So all you have is one tab called "Playback" ?
no, the tab is just called HDA intel
Lemmie guess, you're not running Ubuntu?
does that make a difference if I'm using gnome vs kde?
Yeah, I figured that when you said you were using krec :)
No, but me telling you where to click and what it looks like won't help :)
lol, so should I jump into #kubuntu and ask there instead?
I think you just got an offer from lmg :)
